name: @dungeonmaster/server
description: HTTP and WebSocket server for Dungeonmaster web UI

scripts.ward: bash -c 'FILES=$(fd --glob "$1" src); FILE_PATTERN=$(echo "$FILES" | tr " " "|" | sed "s/|$//"); echo "=== LINT: $1 ==="  && (npx eslint $FILES --fix 2>&1 | grep -A 999999 -E "$FILE_PATTERN" || echo "No lint issues"); echo "" && echo "=== TYPECHECK: $1 ===" && npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | grep -E "$FILE_PATTERN" || echo "No type errors"' --
